document: A BUILDING SYSTEM BASED ON GROWTH by JAMES ROBERT BONAR B. ARCH., UNIVERSITY OF SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA (1964) SUBMITTED IN PARTIAL FULFILLMENT OF THE REQUIREMENTS FOR THE DEGREE OF MASTER IN ARCHITECTURE at the MASSACHUSETTS INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY June, 1965 Signature of Author James Robert Bonar Certified by Eduardo F. Catalano Thesis Supervisor Accepted by Lawrence B. Anderson Chairman, Department of Architecture
